TopicTitle: So these guys clearly play KSP... (Mars Exploration Vehicle Concept)

Articles.Content:
I don't know how closely you folks follow the news, but these plucky fellows seem to be big fans of KSP...

Big orange tanks, orbital construction, nuclear engine cluster, base built out of fuel tanks... seem familiar?

All of those concepts are based on real-life though.

The tanks are orange because the insulation foam used on them is orange, orbital construction is necessary for any large spacecraft, NTR's have been around for decades, and Skylab was made out of an empty Saturn V fuel tank.

I'm pretty much agreeing with Brofessional here. This is more a case of art imitating life, not the other way around.

Also, this sort of thing really goes in the Science Labs
